definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Tian1 zhu3 jiao4 Ai4 guo2 hui4

sentences.english: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒向瑪利亞祈禱，並把她看作仲裁者。

sentences.english: Some practices in the China Church are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 中國天主教會里面有一些做法讓人實在看不懂。

sentences.english: My name is Silas. I am an Opus Dei numerary.
sentences.chinese: 我叫塞拉斯，是天主事工會的成員。“”

sentences.english: Critics argue this stunt is hostile to the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 批語家指出這樣的驚人表演是對天主教堂的不敬重。

sentences.english: Public celebration of the Eucharist in the Roman Catholic Church and some Protestant churches.
sentences.chinese: 十九世紀從羅馬天主教分離出來的天主教派。

sentences.english: Public celebration of the Eucharist in the Roman Catholic Church and some Protestant churches.
sentences.chinese: 十九世紀從羅馬天主教分離出來的天主教派。

sentences.english: Catholics are agnostic to the Protestant creeds.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒對於新教教義來說，是不可知論者。

sentences.english: Humble thyself to God, and wait for his hands.
sentences.chinese: 你在天主面前要自謙，等候他的援手。

sentences.english: Ticki, I sometimes think you just became a catholic to marry me.
sentences.chinese: 蒂奇，有時候我想，你皈依天主教只是爲了同我結婚。

sentences.english: That man has reversed Genesis- man has make God to his image and likeness.
sentences.chinese: 人卻本末倒置，以自己的形像塑造天主。

sentences.english: The Gunpowder Plot of 1605 was the most famous of the Catholic conspiracies.
sentences.chinese: 1605年的火藥陰謀案是最著名的天主教陰謀。

sentences.english: The use of Catholic saints also bespeaks a syncretism of beliefs, he notes.
sentences.chinese: 就連天主教聖人也預言到了這種信仰融合。

sentences.english: Critics say he mishandled the sex-abuse scandal that has rocked the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 也有人認爲他對震撼羅馬天主教會的性醜聞處理不當。

sentences.english: The most famous of the Catholic compiracies was the Gunpowder plot of 1605.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的天主教陰謀是1605年的火藥陰謀案。

sentences.english: God bless you. And may God bless the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 天主保佑你們，怨亓保佑美利堅合衆國。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
